translation.title: Six Discourses on Giving Up Fetters, Etc.

segments.en: 5. Abbreviated Texts on Followers of Other Paths
42–47. Six Discourses on Giving Up Fetters, Etc.

segments.pli: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
segments.en: “Mendicants, if wanderers who follow another path were to ask you:

segments.pli: ‘kimatthiyaṃ, āvuso, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti, evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
segments.en: ‘Reverends, what’s the purpose of living the spiritual life with the ascetic Gotama?’ You should answer them like this:

segments.pli: ‘saṃyojanappahānatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti … pe …
segments.en: ‘The purpose of living the spiritual life under the Buddha is to give up the fetters.’ …

segments.pli: ‘anusayasamugghātanatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti … pe …
‘addhānapariññatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti … pe …
segments.en: ‘… to completely understand the course of time.’ …

segments.pli: ‘āsavānaṃ khayatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti … pe …
‘vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti … pe …
segments.en: ‘… to realize the fruit of knowledge and freedom.’ …

segments.pli: ‘ñāṇadassanatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti … pe ….
